headline: Show HN: Brx – flow state bionic reading in the terminal (written in rust)
description:
brx is a shell command / cli for converting any text (stdin or file path arg) to bionic text for easy reading. Would love for you to give it a look (or star ) and let me know what you think! Hope this helps some people!

Read More: https://bionic-reading.com
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Brx - 终端中的流动状态仿生阅读（用rust编写）。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Brx - 終端中的流動狀態仿生閱讀（用rust編寫）。
